text: Mayak () is a rural locality (a village) in Bikkulovsky Selsoviet, Miyakinsky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 122 as of 2010. There are 3 streets. == Geography == It is located 20 km from Kirgiz-Miyaki, 20 km from Sadovy. == References == Category:Rural localities in Miyakinsky District
title: Mayak, Republic of Bashkortostan
